General.Name: Xybion Digital Inc.
General.Description: Xybion Digital Inc., a software-as-a-service company, provides software solutions for life sciences and health systems companies in the United States and internationally. Its software solutions include Pristima XD, an integrated digital laboratory execution system; Labwise XD, a laboratory operations software to manage GMP and non-GMP-compliant process flows; and digital pathology software solutions. The company also provides COVID-19 test management application; Savante, a data warehouse, analytics, and SEND management system; CQRM XD, a unified cloud based software for predictive compliance, quality, and risk management; Compliance Risk Predictor to predict compliance risks, mitigate, and eliminate; and Compliance Builder, a real-time compliance monitoring software. In addition, it offers Emidence XD, a total workforce health and safety solution; ECM XD, a cloud-based digital platform for managing enterprise content; CQRM XD Quality Management, an all-in-one quality management software and enterprise content management platform, as well as governance, risk, and compliance platform; and QMS OpenText, a quality and compliance management solution. Further, the company provides project management, computer system validation, and software development and testing services. It serves clients in life sciences, workplace health, safety and worker's compensation, transportation, energy, financial services, enterprise solutions, healthcare and insurance, and government industries. The company is headquartered in Princeton, New Jersey. Xybion Digital Inc. is a subsidiary of Banerjee Group LLC.
General.Address: 105 College Street East, Princeton, NJ, United States, 08540
